sentences.english: 1 minute to the airport light rail (up and running by 2011).

sentences.english: NO interchange discount with West Rail Line and Light Rail for route A73.

sentences.english: Passenger may change there for Light Rail.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可在该站转乘轻铁。
